item.title: Ohio commission and Virginia lawmakers consider moves toward mid-decade congressional redistricting
item.description: Mid-cycle congressional redistricting efforts could move forward Friday in two more states amid maneuvering to influence which party will control the U.S.

item.title: School crossing guards face life-threatening dangers on the job
‘It’s home': Caribbean diaspora from Miami to New York fuels Hurricane Melissa relief efforts
